card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Rumbling Terahorn
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Fighter Dual Fang
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Beast Folk. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Quixotic Hero Swine Snout
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, this creature gets +3000 power until the End Step

card.name: Cavern Raider
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Wind Axe, the Warrior Savage
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Bolberg Cross Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ You may cross your cross gear in the battle zone with this creature For No Cost

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Bajula's Soul
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets +2000 power and breaks one more shield. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them into their graveyard.

card.name: Überdragon Valkyrias
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Armored Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Triple breaker

card.name: Super Dragon Machine Dolzark
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever one of your other creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 5000 or less and put it into his mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Helios Tiga Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. If you have a tooltip ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bolgress Bazz, Matchless Dragon Machine
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return any number of Dragons from your mana zone to your hand.
